menu_summary: Wine menu, with a focus on red and white wines from various regions and brands.

products.name: 10000 Hours Syrah Red Mountain 2019
products.description: On the nose, very dark and earthy, with blackberry, espresso bean and hints of lavender. Big and expressive on the palate, with ample rich, chewy tannins leading to a long, fruit-driven finish.

products.name: 10000 Hours Red Blend Red Mountain 2018
products.description: This red offers enticing aromas of ripe red fruit and spice. On the palate, it is medium-bodied with balanced acidity and smooth tannins, leading to a pleasant, lingering finish.

products.name: Antinori Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore Rosso Matarocchio 2017
products.description: Rich with an intense ruby red color, its nose offers aromas of juniper, bay leaves, Morello cherries and licorice.

products.name: Barefoot Chardonnay Buttery California
products.description: A crisp, refreshing blend of juicy peaches and sweet apricots, Barefoot Moscato combines lush, fruity aromas with a bright, crisp finish that is sure to please any crowd. Finished with a tantalizing twist of lemon and citrus.

products.name: Free Reign Sauvignon Blanc California
products.description: This white wine displays bright citrus and floral notes on the nose. The palate is crisp and refreshing with flavors of green apple and pear, complemented by a subtle minerality. It finishes clean and zesty.

products.name: Josh Cellars Chardonnay California
products.description: The nose exudes aromas of tropical fruits and citrus married with subtle oak notes. On the palate, this wine is a great balance of bright citrus and honey with a touch of oak character.
